Token.Abstract: Protocol to receive events related to remote peers.
Called when receive info about remote Peer that just joined the room.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the joining peer.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: User defined information. May be an NSString, NSDictionary or NSArray.

Token.Abstract: Called when a remote peer joins the room.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the joining peer.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: User defined information. May be an NSString, NSDictionary or NSArray.

Parameter.Name: hasDataChannel
Parameter.Abstract: In case the peer enable data channel?

Token.Abstract: Called when receive info about a remote Peer that just refreshed its connection with us.
Token.Declaration: - (void)connection:(nonnull SKYLINKConnection *)connection didRefreshRemotePeerConnection:(null_unspecified NSString *)remotePeerId userInfo:(null_unspecified id)userInfo hasDataChannel:(BOOL)hasDataChannel isIceRestarted:(BOOL)isIceRestarted

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the joining peer.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: User defined information. May be an NSString, NSDictionary or NSArray.

Parameter.Name: isIceRestarted
Parameter.Abstract: Inccase the peer enable iceRestart?

Token.Abstract: Called upon receiving an update about a user Data.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: userData
Parameter.Abstract: User data. May be user name.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the remote peer.

Token.Abstract: Called upon receiving an update about a user info.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the remote peer.

Token.Abstract: Receive info about remote Peer that just disconnected with us.
Token.Declaration: - (void)connection:(nonnull SKYLINKConnection *)connection didDisconnectWithRemotePeer:(nonnull NSString *)remotePeerId userInfo:(null_unspecified id)userInfo hasDataChannel:(BOOL)hasDataChannel

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the peer.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: User defined information. May be an NSString, NSDictionary or NSArray.

Parameter.Name: hasDataChannel
Parameter.Abstract: In case the peer enable data channel?

Token.Abstract: Receive info about remote Peer that just left the room.
Token.Declaration: - (void)connection:(nonnull SKYLINKConnection *)connection didReceiveRemotePeerLeaveRoom:(null_unspecified NSString *)remotePeerId userInfo:(null_unspecified id)userInfo skylinkInfo:(nullable NSDictionary *)skylinkInfo

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the remote peer.

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: User info.

Parameter.Name: skylinkInfo
Parameter.Abstract: SkylinkInfo dictionary contains a code and a message from the underlying system.

Token.Abstract: Called when receive info about remote Peer whose connection with us has broken. This allows user the opportunity to decide how to respond, for e.g. user could choose to reconnect to room or refresh connection with remote Peer.

Parameter.Name: connection
Parameter.Abstract: The underlying connection object.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: Error in case the connection is unsuccessful.

Parameter.Name: remotePeerId
Parameter.Abstract: The unique id of the remote peer.
